## Bio

I am a medical doctor who is passionate about evidence synthesis in healthcare with over 10+ years of research experience. My core area of interest is in the application of epidemiological, spatio-temporal and data science methods in generating actionable evidence for informed decision making in healthcare. Other areas of my work include infectious disease modeling, public health informatics, artificial intelligence and machine learning.
